description.value:
The touch of undeath runs through your blood. Your family tree might contain powerful undead, like a vampire, or perhaps you died and returned a bit different.

Spell List divine

Bloodline Skills Intimidation, Religion

Granted Spells cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chill Touch], 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Harm], 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.False Life], 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bind Undead], 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Talking Corpse], 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cloudkill], 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vampiric Exsanguination], 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Finger of Death], 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Horrid Wilting], 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wail of the Banshee]

Bloodline Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Undeath's Blessing], advanced: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Drain Life], greater: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Grasping Grave]

Blood Magic Necromantic energy flows through you or one target. Either you gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's level for 1 round, or a target takes 1 negative damage per spell level (if the spell already deals initial negative damage, combine this with the spell's initial damage before determining weaknesses and resistances).
